The don't.
They'll just follow the straight line that most objects move in space due to lack of gravity (but I guess it would bend a little from time to time since there exists other masses) and they reach our system and find the ONLY PLANET WITH LIFE AND TECHNOLOGY TO PRODUCE IT.

And then war.

What if coke is poisonous to them?
